useCase.name: Upload Material Photo

preconditions.precondition: User has opened the application and is on the Homepage screen.

useCase.trigger: User selects the option to take a photo of a material.

mainSequence.step: User decides to take a photo and captures the image.
The captured photo is displayed for review on the Display Picture Screen.
The photo is uploaded to the ApiService for processing.
The material is added through the MaterialsRouter and confirmed.
Success message displayed to the user.
Homepage screen is updated with the new material in the list.
